title: "AI Search Art"
content:
ðŸ‘‹ Welcome to AI Search Art!

Our website is dedicated to providing you with a unique and modern browsing experience. Our abstract illustration of an AI-powered search engine wallpaper sets the tone for our minimalist design philosophy.

We believe that simplicity is key, and that's why we've created a clean and easy-to-use interface that allows you to focus on what really matters: finding what you're looking for. With our powerful search engine, you can quickly and easily find the information you need, without any distractions.

Whether you're searching for the latest news, researching a topic for school, or just browsing the web, AI Search Art has got you covered. So why wait? Start exploring today!

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A wallpaper featuring an abstract illustration of an AI-powered search engine, with a minimalist and modern design."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
